comment: Cusom Converter to convert a JSON value to VoltScript scalar. This is used as the default for any conversion.
codesample:
%REM
The following code is used in ser-10.txt. Converts to strings and numerics for firstName, lastName and age.
%END REM
Dim json as String
Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper()
Dim jd as New Person()
jd.firstName = &quot;John&quot;
jd.lastName = &quot;Doe&quot;
jd.age = 42
json = helper.withScalarConverter(&quot;firstName&quot;)._
    withScalarConverter(&quot;lastName&quot;)._
    withScalarConverter(&quot;age&quot;)
    toJsonString(jd, false)
commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Cusom Converter to convert a JSON value to VoltScript scalar. This is used as the default for any conversion.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
commenthtml: Cusom Converter to convert a JSON value to VoltScript scalar. This is used as the default for any conversion.

Converts to strings and numerics for firstName, lastName and age.&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Dim json as String&lt;br /&gt;Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper()&lt;br /&gt;Dim jd as New Person()&lt;br /&gt;jd.firstName = &quot;John&quot;&lt;br /&gt;jd.lastName = &quot;Doe&quot;&lt;br /&gt;jd.age = 42&lt;br /&gt;json = helper.withScalarConverter(&quot;firstName&quot;)._&lt;br /&gt;    withScalarConverter(&quot;lastName&quot;)._&lt;br /&gt;    withScalarConverter(&quot;age&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;    toJsonString(jd, false)

methods.label: fromJson
methods.comment: Overridden function, uses scalar value from JSON object. The fromJson method is called from AbstractJsonConverter&apos;s deserialize method.
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code is an abbreviated version of code in AbstractJsonConverter.deserialize. It calls the derived class&apos;s fromJson function and passes the result to AbstractJsonConverter.deserializeToProperty
%END REM
Sub deserialize(holder as JsonConversionHolder, source as JsonObject)
   Call deserializeToProperty(holder, fromJson(source), source.label)
End Sub

methods.label: toJson
methods.comment: Overridden function. The toJson method is called from AbstractJsonConverter&apos;s serialize method.
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code is an abbreviated version of code in AbstractJsonConverter.serialize. It extracts a property value, passes it to the derived class&apos;s toJson function and passes the result to AbstractJsonConverter.serializeToProperty
%END REM
Sub serialize(source as Variant, target as JsonObject)
    Dim propName as String
    Dim execString as String
    propName = Me.labelName
    Set samsaraObj = source
    execString = |If (isObject(samsaraObj.| & propName & |)) Then
        Set samsaraVal = samsaraObj.| & propName & |
    Else
        samsaraVal = samsaraObj.| & propName & |
    End If|
    Call serializeToProperty(toJson(samsaraVal), target)
End Sub
methods.signature: Public Function toJson(source As Variant) As Variant
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Overridden function. The toJson method is called from AbstractJsonConverter&apos;s serialize method.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
